cardContent.folded: 20-year-old female, mild asthma, allergic rhinitis, migraines, recurrent UTIs, anxiety, depression, appendectomy.
cardContent.expanded: 20-year-old woman with mild persistent asthma, allergic rhinitis, migraines, recurrent UTIs, anxiety, depression, insomnia, acne, and history of appendectomy; on inhalers, topical acne meds, sumatriptan, nitrofurantoin.

cardContent.folded: Persistent low mood, fatigue, negative self-perception, social withdrawal, sleep disturbance, minimal improvement, good medication adherence.

cardContent.expanded: Ongoing emotional numbness, entrenched negative thoughts, difficulty engaging socially, poor sleep, and struggles with self-worth and academic/career pressures.
